item.title: FHN
item.description: score:-40 Chances: First Horizon Corporation is showing consistent growth and recognition in the financial industry, with positive earnings reports and multiple awards for its commitment to employee health and well-being. The company’s participation in industry conferences and recognition in diverse lists such as Color Magazine and Diversity Woman magazine showcases its commitment to diversity and inclusion.
